column4: ever since upgrading my kernel (ubuntu) 2.6.15-26-686, my mic stopped working...i tried everything i know, and can't make it work, can anyone help?
Multimedia audio controller: Creative Labs SB Live! EMU10k1 (rev 07)
are you SURE you don't have a setting wrong? (Capture volume)
nope, tested on a different pc and was working before, plus i can here myself if i unmute the mic
if you can hear yourself, then the mic is working...
it's the program you're trying to record in
i know, but i can't record, capture, skype, or anything
arecord in console doesn't even record
look at the audio settings in those programs... not sure what to tell you
i think that is a hardware thing
